sub_title: Talent Manager | Recruitment Consultant | Corporate Recruitment l Career Consultant | Talent Acquisition | Talent Development | Maritime | Offshore | Oil and Gas | Energy | Engineering | #WeAreHiring
summary:
I started my career path in the United Arab Emirates and after getting enough sunshine in the desert,  decided to relocate to the rainy Netherlands. With my recruitment background, I have access to the most up-to-date information on what employers are looking for and I can help you navigate through Middle Eastern and Dutch markets with ease.

I have experience working with the Netherlands, MENA region (UAE, Qatar, Saudi Arabia), Singapore, Russia, and other CIS countries in Agency Recruitment, Career Consulting, Human Resources, Crew Coordination and Team Management. 

My experience lies in Offshore, International Shipping, Maritime, Oil & Gas, Civil Engineering, Renewables, Energy, Shipbuilding, and Civil Construction industries.

As a partner of our clients, I help to accomplish their recruitment needs with tailor-made solutions. Office personnel, middle- and high-management profiles, and highly educated technical personnel deserve more attention in these demanding industries. With a personal and strategic approach, I provide maritime, energy, and civil knowledge, expertise, and insights in the process. 

I also provide career consulting services and help enthusiastic candidates in their Job Search journey. I assist with LinkedIn and CV branding, interview preparations, and job search strategy, and provide career path guidance.

I consider myself a proactive, solution-oriented, and commercially astute professional with a winner mindset.

Happy to connect!

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
As a Talent Manager, I am in charge of recruiting and selecting candidates for all iPS offices worldwide with an additional focus on the training and development of our staff personnel. I am committed to building strong relationships with employees, hiring managers, candidates, and external partners to ensure a seamless recruitment and talent development processes.

About iPS Powerful People: iPS is the market leader when it comes to global staffing solutions in all industries in which we are active. With our 35 years of experience in recruiting highly qualified personnel within the Maritime, Energy, and Civil sector, we are known in the market as a qualified contact point. IPS Powerful People is headquartered in Capelle aan den IJssel, near Rotterdam, and we also have a wide range of overseas offices and agencies in the United Kingdom, United Arab Emirates, United States of America, Mexico, Germany, and Lithuania, among others. Thanks to our immense international network, iPS can provide solutions to personnel problems and get the job done. Always.
- iPS Powerful People is best known for the crewing services for offshore, renewables, maritime and civil projects.
- The Select division of iPS works on the same prestigious projects, with a focus on office and management-related positions.
- iPS | Nautech Services offers professional recruitment & HR Services, specializing in offshore, survey, construction, and subsea markets, with a worldwide customer database and international pool of contractors.
profile_positions.title: Talent Manager

profile_positions.description:
Role: Senior Recruitment Consultant in charge of Corporate Recruitment. With extensive experience in talent acquisition, I have a proven track record of identifying and hiring top talent in highly competitive markets. My expertise includes recruiting for a variety of industries, with a focus on oil & energy, maritime and engineering. I am skilled in developing and implementing recruiting strategies that align with business objectives and drive results.

I have successfully sourced and hired top talent for key positions within the organization, resulting in a more diverse and high-performing team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruitment Consultant (Corporate Recruitment)

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
Role: Senior Recruitment Consultant, in charge of developing and maintaining client relationships and supervising the team. 

As a partner of our clients, we at iPS Select help to accomplish their recruitment needs with tailor-made solutions. Office personnel, middle- and high-management profiles, and highly educated technical personnel deserve more attention in these demanding industries. With a personal approach, we provide our clients with industry knowledge, expertise, and insights into the process.

Our long-time reputation in the maritime, energy and civil construction industries results in an extensive network of highly profiled candidates. We understand the wishes and competencies of our candidates. This allows us to connect them to the vacancy that fully fits their wishes and career path.

Are you interested and looking for new candidates or are you ready for a new challenge?
Get in touch with me: N.Startseva@ipsselect.com
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruitment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
In addition to providing career consulting services, I offer a comprehensive range of support to help enthusiastic candidates navigate their job search journey with confidence and clarity. Whether you're just starting out on your career path or looking to make a change, my services can help you identify your strengths and develop a compelling personal brand that showcases your unique skills and experience.

Through personalized coaching, I can help you optimize your LinkedIn profile and create a standout CV that resonates with prospective employers. I'll also provide guidance on how to prepare for interviews, including mock interviews that simulate the actual experience to help you build confidence and improve your performance.

But my services don't stop there. I'll also work with you to develop a job search strategy that's tailored to your goals and preferences, helping you identify potential job opportunities and navigate the application process with ease. And if you're feeling overwhelmed or unsure about which career path to pursue, I'm here to offer guidance and support to help you make the best decision for your future.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Jack-Up Barge is your competitive partner for self-elevating platforms. Jack-Up Barge is a member of the Van Es Holding Group of companies.

Role: Was a focal point for recruitment, international HR operations, marine crew coordination and operations in Europe (the Netherlands, Germany, Denmark) and the Middle East (UAE, KSA and Oman).
